doc.field: Concord Fabrics Inc said it has restructered its long-term debt with an institutional lender. The company said it extended its debt by borrowing 15 mln dlrs and paying off its existing term loan of 3,100,000 dlrs, resulting in a new debt of 11.9 mln dlrs. The company said the remaining funds will be used to equip a prooduction facility in Chino, Calif., and provide working capital. Reuter
